DOC.brief_summary: This study compare acid-base change hemodialysis treatment standard dialysis bath versus lower bicarbonate dialysis bath , aim define factor limit equilibration bicarbonate concentration patient 's blood dialysate .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Standard Versus Low Bicarbonate Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Receiving chronic thriceweekly conventional hemodialysis least 3 month Age > 18 year Use oral alkali within previous month Hospitalization within previous month Inability provide write informed consent Pregnancy
